AI Applications in Healthcare.label: Early Warning System
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI detecting patient deterioration before clinical crisis

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: Ambient AI
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI capturing clinical conversations for documentation

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: Predictive Analytics
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI using data to forecast future health events

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: AI Scribe
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI system automating clinical documentation from conversations

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: Risk Prediction
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI models estimating likelihood of adverse health outcomes

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: Chatbot
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI conversational agent for patient interaction

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: RPM
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: Remote Physiologic Monitoring using connected devices

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: RTM
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: Remote Therapeutic Monitoring for treatment adherence

AI Applications in Healthcare.label: Virtual Staining
AI Applications in Healthcare.definition: AI generating stained tissue images without chemical staining

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: AI Governance
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Framework for oversight, accountability, and management of AI systems

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Post-deployment Monitoring
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Ongoing surveillance of AI system performance after implementation

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Trustworthy AI
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: AI systems designed to be safe, fair, transparent, and accountable

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Human-in-the-Loop
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: AI design requiring human oversight and intervention in decisions

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Safe Harbor
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Legal protection for entities meeting specified compliance standards

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Bias Testing
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Evaluation of AI systems for unfair or discriminatory outputs

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Pre-deployment Evaluation
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Assessment of AI systems before clinical implementation

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Model Card
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Standardized documentation describing AI model characteristics and limitations

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Robustness Testing
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Evaluation of AI system reliability under varied conditions

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: NIST AI RMF
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: NIST Artificial Intelligence Risk Management Framework

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: Shadow Mode
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: AI deployment where outputs are recorded but not acted upon

AI Governance and Evaluation.label: AI Bill of Materials
AI Governance and Evaluation.definition: Documentation of AI system components and dependencies

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Algorithmic Bias
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Systematic errors in AI outputs that create unfair outcomes

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Model Drift
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Degradation of AI model performance over time due to data changes

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Agentic AI
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI systems capable of autonomous action and decision-making

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Explainable AI
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI systems whose decisions can be understood by humans

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Machine Learning
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI systems that learn and improve from data without explicit programming

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: AI Hallucination
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI generating false or fabricated information presented as fact

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Black Box AI
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI systems whose internal decision-making is opaque or unexplainable

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Generative AI
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI systems that create new content including text, images, or code

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: SaMD
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Software as a Medical Device, software intended for medical purposes

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Large Language Model
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI model trained on vast text data for natural language understanding

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Natural Language Processing
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI technology for understanding and generating human language

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: RAG
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Retrieval-Augmented Generation, AI technique combining retrieval with generation

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: AI/ML SaMD
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: AI and machine learning-based software as medical device

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Digital Twin
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Virtual model of a patient or system for simulation and prediction

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: Federated Learning
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Machine learning approach training models across decentralized data

AI and Machine Learning Concepts.label: RLHF
AI and Machine Learning Concepts.definition: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback for AI alignment

Accreditation and Certification.label: Accreditation
Accreditation and Certification.definition: Formal recognition of meeting quality standards

Accreditation and Certification.label: Conditions of Participation
Accreditation and Certification.definition: CMS requirements for providers to participate in Medicare

Accreditation and Certification.label: FDA Clearance
Accreditation and Certification.definition: FDA authorization for medical devices to be marketed

Accreditation and Certification.label: ONC Certification
Accreditation and Certification.definition: Federal certification for health IT products

Accreditation and Certification.label: Meaningful Use
Accreditation and Certification.definition: CMS program incentivizing EHR adoption and use

Accreditation and Certification.label: Promoting Interoperability
Accreditation and Certification.definition: CMS program promoting health IT interoperability

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Diagnosis
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Identification of disease or condition through examination

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Treatment
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Medical care provided to cure or manage a condition

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Informed Consent
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Patient agreement to treatment after understanding risks

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Care Coordination
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Organization of patient care activities across providers

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Screening
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Testing to detect disease before symptoms appear

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Triage
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Process of prioritizing patients based on urgency

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Shared Decision-Making
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Collaborative process between patient and provider for care decisions

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Clinical Trial
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Research study testing medical interventions in humans

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Risk Stratification
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Categorizing patients by likelihood of adverse outcomes

Clinical Processes and Procedures.label: Trial Matching
Clinical Processes and Procedures.definition: Process of identifying eligible patients for clinical trials

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Behavioral Health
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Mental health and substance use disorder treatment services

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Chronic Disease Management
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Ongoing care for long-term health conditions

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Pathology
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Medical specialty diagnosing disease through laboratory analysis

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Population Health
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Health outcomes and determinants of defined populations

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Genomics
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Study of genes and their functions for personalized medicine

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Oncology
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Medical specialty focused on cancer diagnosis and treatment

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Precision Medicine
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Tailored medical treatment based on individual characteristics

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Radiology
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Medical specialty using imaging for diagnosis and treatment

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Nuclear Medicine
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Medical specialty using radioactive substances for diagnosis

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Perioperative Care
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Care provided before, during, and after surgery

Clinical Specialties and Domains.label: Transitional Care
Clinical Specialties and Domains.definition: Care coordination during transitions between settings

Data Privacy and Security.label: Data Provenance
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Documentation of data origin and transformation history

Data Privacy and Security.label: Data Governance
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Management of data availability, usability, and security

Data Privacy and Security.label: Cybersecurity
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Protection of computer systems from digital attacks

Data Privacy and Security.label: Encryption
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Process of encoding data to prevent unauthorized access

Data Privacy and Security.label: De-identification
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Removal of identifying information from health data

Data Privacy and Security.label: PHI
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Protected Health Information under HIPAA regulations

Data Privacy and Security.label: BAA
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Business Associate Agreement under HIPAA for data handling

Data Privacy and Security.label: Information Blocking
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Practice interfering with access to electronic health information

Data Privacy and Security.label: Audit Trail
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Record of system activities for security and compliance

Data Privacy and Security.label: SOC 2
Data Privacy and Security.definition: Service Organization Control 2 security compliance standard

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: CMS
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, administers federal healthcare programs
terms: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: FDA
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Food and Drug Administration, regulates medical devices and drugs

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: ONC
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology within HHS
terms: Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: CMS Innovation Center
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation, tests new payment and delivery models
terms: Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: NIH
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: National Institutes of Health, primary federal agency for biomedical research

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: AHRQ
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality, focuses on healthcare quality research
terms: Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: CDC
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, national public health agency
terms: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: NIST
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: National Institute of Standards and Technology, develops technology standards
terms: National Institute of Standards and Technology

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: OCR
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Office for Civil Rights within HHS, enforces HIPAA privacy and security

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: OIG
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Office of Inspector General, oversees fraud and abuse in HHS programs

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: SAMHSA
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration within HHS
terms: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: HRSA
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Health Resources and Services Administration, supports underserved populations

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: IHS
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Indian Health Service, provides healthcare to American Indians and Alaska Natives

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: NSF
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: National Science Foundation, supports fundamental research and education

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: OHRP
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Office for Human Research Protections, oversees human subjects research

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: OMB
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Office of Management and Budget, oversees federal agency performance

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: CISA
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, protects critical infrastructure

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: DOE
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Department of Energy, supports scientific research including computing

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: DOJ
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Department of Justice, federal law enforcement and prosecution

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: DoD
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Department of Defense, oversees military health system

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: NCI
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: National Cancer Institute, leads federal cancer research

Federal Agencies and Departments.label: VA
Federal Agencies and Departments.definition: Department of Veterans Affairs, provides healthcare to veterans

Fraud and Compliance.label: Compliance
Fraud and Compliance.definition: Adherence to laws, regulations, and policies

Fraud and Compliance.label: Waste
Fraud and Compliance.definition: Overuse of services or inefficient use of resources

Fraud and Compliance.label: Abuse
Fraud and Compliance.definition: Practices inconsistent with sound fiscal or medical practices

Fraud and Compliance.label: WISeR
Fraud and Compliance.definition: Wasteful and Inappropriate Service Reduction Model

Fraud and Compliance.label: Improper Payment
Fraud and Compliance.definition: Payment that should not have been made or was incorrect

Health Information Systems.label: EHR
Health Information Systems.definition: Electronic Health Record system for digital patient medical records

Health Information Systems.label: CDS
Health Information Systems.definition: Clinical Decision Support system providing clinical guidance at point of care

Health Information Systems.label: EMR
Health Information Systems.definition: Electronic Medical Record, digital version of patient chart

Health Information Systems.label: PACS
Health Information Systems.definition: Picture Archiving and Communication System for medical imaging storage

Health Information Systems.label: HIE
Health Information Systems.definition: Health Information Exchange for sharing patient data across organizations

Health Information Systems.label: HRIS
Health Information Systems.definition: Human Resources Information System for workforce management

Health Information Systems.label: RIS
Health Information Systems.definition: Radiology Information System for radiology workflow management

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Documentation
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Recording of clinical information in patient medical records

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Claims Processing
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Administrative handling of healthcare payment requests

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Medical Coding
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Translation of healthcare services into standardized codes for billing

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Credentialing
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Verification of healthcare provider qualifications and licenses

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Quality Reporting
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Submission of healthcare quality measures to regulatory bodies

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Prior Authorization
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Payer approval required before providing certain medical services

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Utilization Management
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Process of evaluating medical necessity and appropriateness of care

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Revenue Cycle Management
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Financial process from patient registration through payment collection

Healthcare Administrative Processes.label: Risk Adjustment
Healthcare Administrative Processes.definition: Payment modification based on patient health status and risk factors

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Interoperability
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Ability of systems to exchange and use information

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Vendor
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Company providing products or services to healthcare organizations

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Scalability
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Ability of system to handle growth in volume or scope

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Pilot Program
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Small-scale test of new initiative before full implementation

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Procurement
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Process of acquiring goods and services

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Administrative Burden
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Non-clinical tasks consuming healthcare worker time

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: ROI
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Return on Investment, measure of financial benefit

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Workflow Integration
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Incorporation of tools into existing clinical processes

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Change Management
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Structured approach to transitioning organizations to new processes

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: Total Cost of Care
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Complete healthcare spending for a patient or population

Healthcare Business and Operations.label: FTE
Healthcare Business and Operations.definition: Full-Time Equivalent, measure of workforce capacity

Healthcare IT Standards.label: FHIR
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources, modern health data exchange standard

Healthcare IT Standards.label: HL7
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Health Level Seven International, health informatics standards organization

Healthcare IT Standards.label: CPT
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Current Procedural Terminology codes for medical procedures and services

Healthcare IT Standards.label: USCDI
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: United States Core Data for Interoperability, standardized health data set

Healthcare IT Standards.label: DICOM
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine standard for medical imaging
terms: Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

Healthcare IT Standards.label: TEFCA
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Trusted Exchange Framework and Common Agreement for nationwide data exchange
terms: Trusted Exchange Framework and Common Agreement

Healthcare IT Standards.label: C-CDA
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Consolidated Clinical Document Architecture for clinical document exchange

Healthcare IT Standards.label: GA4GH
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health, genomic data sharing standards
terms: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health

Healthcare IT Standards.label: Gravity Project
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: HL7 initiative for social determinants of health data standards

Healthcare IT Standards.label: ICD-10
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: International Classification of Diseases 10th revision for diagnosis coding

Healthcare IT Standards.label: IEEE 11073
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: IEEE standard for medical device communication

Healthcare IT Standards.label: LOINC
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes for lab and clinical observations
terms: Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes

Healthcare IT Standards.label: OMOP
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership common data model for research

Healthcare IT Standards.label: mCODE
Healthcare IT Standards.definition: Minimal Common Oncology Data Elements standard for cancer data

Healthcare Programs.label: Medicare
Healthcare Programs.definition: Federal health insurance program for people 65+ and certain disabilities

Healthcare Programs.label: Medicaid
Healthcare Programs.definition: Joint federal-state health coverage program for low-income individuals

Healthcare Programs.label: ACO
Healthcare Programs.definition: Accountable Care Organization, provider group sharing financial risk

Healthcare Programs.label: Medicare Advantage
Healthcare Programs.definition: Private insurance alternative to traditional Medicare (Part C)

Healthcare Programs.label: APM
Healthcare Programs.definition: Alternative Payment Model, value-based reimbursement approach

Healthcare Programs.label: ACO REACH
Healthcare Programs.definition: CMS accountable care model with enhanced risk sharing

Healthcare Programs.label: CCBHC
Healthcare Programs.definition: Certified Community Behavioral Health Clinic model

Healthcare Programs.label: HPP
Healthcare Programs.definition: Hospital Preparedness Program for emergency readiness

Healthcare Programs.label: MIPS
Healthcare Programs.definition: Merit-Based Incentive Payment System for Medicare physician payments

Healthcare Programs.label: MSSP
Healthcare Programs.definition: Medicare Shared Savings Program for accountable care organizations

Healthcare Programs.label: NDMS
Healthcare Programs.definition: National Disaster Medical System for emergency medical response

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Health Equity
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Fair opportunity for everyone to attain full health potential

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Patient Safety
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Prevention of errors and adverse events in healthcare

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Adverse Event
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Unintended harm to patient from medical care

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Health Disparities
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Differences in health outcomes between population groups

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Alert Fatigue
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Desensitization to clinical alerts from excessive notifications

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Burnout
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Physical and emotional exhaustion from work-related stress

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Quality Improvement
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Systematic efforts to improve healthcare processes and outcomes

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: HEDIS
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Healthcare Effectiveness Data and Information Set quality measures
terms: Healthcare Effectiveness Data and Information Set

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: QAPI
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: Quality Assurance and Performance Improvement program

Healthcare Quality and Safety.label: Star Ratings
Healthcare Quality and Safety.definition: CMS quality rating system for Medicare plans

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Hospital
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Facility providing inpatient medical care and treatment

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Health System
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Integrated network of healthcare facilities and providers

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Ambulatory Care
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Outpatient medical services not requiring hospital admission

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Emergency Department
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Hospital unit providing immediate care for acute conditions

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Long-Term Care
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Extended care services for chronic illness or disability

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Rural Hospital
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Hospital serving rural and remote geographic areas

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Safety-Net Provider
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Healthcare organization serving high proportion of uninsured patients

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: Academic Medical Center
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Hospital affiliated with medical school for teaching and research

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: ICU
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Intensive Care Unit for critically ill patients

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: IDTF
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Independent Diagnostic Testing Facility for diagnostic services

Healthcare Settings and Facilities.label: SNF
Healthcare Settings and Facilities.definition: Skilled Nursing Facility providing post-acute and long-term care

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Provider
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Individual or organization delivering healthcare services

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Physician
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Medical doctor licensed to practice medicine

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Nurse
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Licensed healthcare professional providing patient care

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: CIO
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Chief Information Officer, executive leading IT strategy

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: CMIO
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Chief Medical Information Officer, physician leading health IT

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: CMO
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Chief Medical Officer, senior physician executive

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: CFO
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Chief Financial Officer, executive leading financial operations

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Care Manager
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Professional coordinating patient care across settings

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Radiologist
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Physician specializing in medical imaging interpretation

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: CISO
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Chief Information Security Officer, executive leading cybersecurity

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: CNA
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Certified Nursing Assistant providing basic patient care

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Oncologist
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Physician specializing in cancer diagnosis and treatment

Healthcare Workforce Roles.label: Pathologist
Healthcare Workforce Roles.definition: Physician specializing in disease diagnosis through lab analysis

Laws and Regulations.label: HIPAA
Laws and Regulations.definition: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, governs health data privacy
terms: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act

Laws and Regulations.label: 21st Century Cures Act
Laws and Regulations.definition: Law promoting health IT interoperability and reducing information blocking

Laws and Regulations.label: Anti-Kickback Statute
Laws and Regulations.definition: Law prohibiting payment for patient referrals in federal programs

Laws and Regulations.label: HIPAA Privacy Rule
Laws and Regulations.definition: HIPAA regulation protecting patient health information privacy

Laws and Regulations.label: Stark Law
Laws and Regulations.definition: Physician self-referral law prohibiting certain financial relationships

Laws and Regulations.label: 42 CFR Part 2
Laws and Regulations.definition: Federal regulation protecting confidentiality of substance use records

Laws and Regulations.label: 45 CFR Part 170
Laws and Regulations.definition: Health IT certification regulations

Laws and Regulations.label: EU AI Act
Laws and Regulations.definition: European Union comprehensive regulation on artificial intelligence

Laws and Regulations.label: HIPAA Security Rule
Laws and Regulations.definition: HIPAA regulation requiring safeguards for electronic health information

Laws and Regulations.label: NDAA
Laws and Regulations.definition: National Defense Authorization Act, annual defense policy legislation

Laws and Regulations.label: 21 CFR Part 11
Laws and Regulations.definition: FDA regulation for electronic records and signatures

Laws and Regulations.label: 42 CFR Part 483
Laws and Regulations.definition: Federal requirements for long-term care facilities

Laws and Regulations.label: 42 CFR Part 493
Laws and Regulations.definition: CLIA regulations for laboratory standards

Laws and Regulations.label: ADA
Laws and Regulations.definition: Americans with Disabilities Act, civil rights law for disability

Laws and Regulations.label: EKRA
Laws and Regulations.definition: Eliminating Kickbacks in Recovery Act, anti-kickback law for substance use

Laws and Regulations.label: False Claims Act
Laws and Regulations.definition: Law imposing liability for fraudulent claims to federal programs

Laws and Regulations.label: GDPR
Laws and Regulations.definition: General Data Protection Regulation, EU data privacy law

Laws and Regulations.label: HITECH Act
Laws and Regulations.definition: Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act

Laws and Regulations.label: MIPPA
Laws and Regulations.definition: Medicare Improvements for Patients and Providers Act of 2008

Laws and Regulations.label: TCPA
Laws and Regulations.definition: Telephone Consumer Protection Act, regulates telemarketing communications

Liability and Legal Concepts.label: Accountability
Liability and Legal Concepts.definition: Obligation to accept responsibility for actions

Liability and Legal Concepts.label: Liability
Liability and Legal Concepts.definition: Legal responsibility for harm or damages

Liability and Legal Concepts.label: Indemnification
Liability and Legal Concepts.definition: Protection against liability through contractual agreement

Liability and Legal Concepts.label: Standard of Care
Liability and Legal Concepts.definition: Level of care a reasonable provider would deliver

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Cancer
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Disease characterized by uncontrolled cell growth

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Anxiety
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Mental health condition characterized by excessive worry

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Diabetes
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Metabolic disease affecting blood sugar regulation

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Sepsis
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Life-threatening response to infection causing organ dysfunction

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Dementia
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Decline in cognitive function affecting daily activities

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Depression
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Mental health disorder causing persistent sadness

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Diabetic Retinopathy
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Diabetes complication affecting blood vessels in the retina

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Heart Failure
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Condition where heart cannot pump blood effectively

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Rare Disease
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Medical condition affecting small percentage of population

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Liver Disease
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Conditions affecting liver function and health

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Multiple Sclerosis
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Chronic autoimmune disease affecting the central nervous system

Medical Conditions and Diseases.label: Obesity
Medical Conditions and Diseases.definition: Condition of excess body fat affecting health

Patient-Centered Concepts.label: Caregiver
Patient-Centered Concepts.definition: Person providing care and support to a patient

Patient-Centered Concepts.label: Patient Trust
Patient-Centered Concepts.definition: Confidence patients have in healthcare providers and systems

Patient-Centered Concepts.label: Patient Autonomy
Patient-Centered Concepts.definition: Right of patients to make decisions about their care

Patient-Centered Concepts.label: Patient Experience
Patient-Centered Concepts.definition: Patient perceptions of their healthcare interactions

Patient-Centered Concepts.label: Patient Engagement
Patient-Centered Concepts.definition: Active involvement of patients in their healthcare

Patient-Centered Concepts.label: Patient-Generated Health Data
Patient-Centered Concepts.definition: Health data created by patients outside clinical settings

Payment and Reimbursement.label: Value-Based Care
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Payment model linking reimbursement to quality and outcomes

Payment and Reimbursement.label: Fee-for-Service
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Payment model reimbursing providers for each service rendered

Payment and Reimbursement.label: Bundled Payment
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Single payment for all services in an episode of care

Payment and Reimbursement.label: NTAP
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: New Technology Add-on Payment for innovative medical technologies

Payment and Reimbursement.label: Physician Fee Schedule
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Medicare payment rates for physician services

Payment and Reimbursement.label: RVU
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Relative Value Unit, measure of physician work for payment calculation

Payment and Reimbursement.label: CED
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Coverage with Evidence Development, conditional Medicare coverage

Payment and Reimbursement.label: MLR
Payment and Reimbursement.definition: Medical Loss Ratio, percentage of premiums spent on medical care

Professional Organizations.label: AMA

Professional Organizations.definition: Healthcare accreditation organization setting quality standards

Professional Organizations.definition: American Cancer Society, cancer research and advocacy organization

Professional Organizations.label: AdvaMed

Professional Organizations.label: Coalition for Health AI
Professional Organizations.definition: Multi-stakeholder coalition developing AI governance standards

Professional Organizations.definition: Nonprofit organization focused on healthcare safety

Professional Organizations.definition: Intersocietal Accreditation Commission for diagnostic imaging

Research and Funding Mechanisms.definition: Federal funding mechanism with substantial agency involvement

Research and Funding Mechanisms.definition: Real-World Evidence from clinical practice data
